La Marque City Council
======================

La Marque City Council Members
------------------------------

[Keith Bell, Mayor](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/Directory.aspx?EID=21)

[Kimberley Yancy, District A](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/directory.aspx?EID=139)

[Joe Compian, Mayor Pro - Tem - District B](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/directory.aspx?EID=136)

[Joseph Lowry, District C](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/directory.aspx?EID=140)

[Tonia Griffin, District D](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/Directory.aspx?EID=197)

Not sure which is Council District is yours? [Just click to see the Voting Districts](http://cityoflamarque.org/298/Council-District-Maps).

![Voting District Map](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=158)

City Council Meetings
---------------------

La Marque City Council Regular Meetings are held at 6:00 p.m. on the second & fourth Monday of each month in   
City Council Chambers, at 1109B Bayou Road, La Marque Texas 77568.

In accordance with the order of the Office of the Governor issued on March 16,
2020, the La Marque City Council will conduct in-person meetings as well as via teleconference (ZOOM)
in order to advance the public health goal of limiting face-to-face
meetings to slow the spread of COVID-19.

[Register for calendar reminders](http://cityoflamarque.org/list.aspx)

Council Meeting Videos and Live Streaming
-----------------------------------------

Every City Council Meeting is available to watch via live stream on YouTube. Comcast customers can watch for free on Channel 16.

[Subscribe to our YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxVsgw5xtGI61mjpnZIsq_A/featured)

Citizen Participation in Council Meetings
-----------------------------------------

(Limited to three minutes per person) Comments from the public will be heard at this time. Any person with city related business who has signed up may speak to Council on a specific agenda item (limited to three (3) minutes) should give the Mayor your name and the item you wish to speak about. In compliance with Texas Open Meeting Act, the City may not deliberate on comments.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval. [View Agendas and Minutes](https://www.cityoflamarque.org/129/Agendas-Minutes)

Message from the Mayor
----------------------

Check out the[latest city news and Council updates](https://ci.la-marque.tx.us/622/Message-from-the-Mayor) from La Marque Mayor Keith Bell.

Questions
---------

Please contact the City Clerk at 409-938-9259 or [cityclerk@cityoflamarque.org](mailto:cityclerk@cityoflamarque.org) for information.
